description: This file defines a React functional component named Cabinets, which displays and allows editing of a list of cabinet items with their status and location. It fetches data from an API endpoint, renders a table with inline editing capabilities, and updates the local state accordingly.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches cabinet data from the API endpoint and updates the component's state.

methods.name: updateRow
methods.description: Updates a specific row in the local state with new data.
